info.title: RDKShell API
info.description: The `RDKShell` plugin controls the management of composition, layout, Z order, and key handling.

keyCode.summary: The key code of the key to intercept (only symbol * (string data type) is acceptable)

modifiers.summary: A list of modifiers that need to be present to intercept (`ctrl`, `alt`, and `shift` are supported)

uri.summary: The URI of the app (empty, if unable to get URI status)

visible.summary: Whether the client is visible (`true`) or not (`false`)

holePunch.summary: Whether hole punching is enabled (`true`) or disabled (`false`)

ram.summary: The amount of free memory remaining in Kilobytes

addAnimation.summary:
Performs the set of animations. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

animations.summary: A list of animations to perform

a.summary: The alpha/opacity level to animate to (between 0 and 100)

duration.summary: The duration of the animation in seconds

tween.summary: The animation tween type. The default is `linear`

addKeyIntercept.summary:
Adds a key intercept to the client application specified. The keys are specified by a key code and a set of modifiers. Regardless of the application that has focus, key presses that match the key code and modifiers will be sent to the client application. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

addKeyIntercepts.summary:
Adds the list of key intercepts. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

keys.summary: A list of keys to simulate

addKeyListener.summary:
Adds a key listener to an application. The keys are bubbled up based on their z-order. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

keys.summary: A list of keys on which to add a listener for the specified application

activate.summary: Activate an application on key event. The default is `false`

propagate.summary: Propagate to the next application in the z-order. The default is `true`

addKeyMetadataListener.summary:
Adds the key metadata listeners. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

createDisplay.summary:
Creates a display for the specified client using the configuration parameters. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

virtualDisplay.summary: Whether to create a virtual display (`true`) or not (`false`)

virtualWidth.summary: The width of the virtual display

virtualHeight.summary: The height of the virtual display

topmost.summary: Whether to set topmost (true) or not (false)

destroy.summary:
Destroys an application. 
 
### Events 
| Event | Description | 
| :----------- | :----------- |
| `OnDestroyed` | Triggers when a runtime is successfully destroyed |

enableInactivityReporting.summary:
Enables or disables inactivity reporting and events. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

enable.summary: Whether to enable (`true`) or disable (`false`) inactivity reporting

enableKeyRepeats.summary:
Enables or disables key repeats. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

enable.summary: Whether to enable (`true`) or disable (`false`) key repeats

enableLogsFlushing.summary:
Enables or disables flushing all logs. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

enable.summary: Whether to enable (`true`) or disable (`false`) log flushing

enableVirtualDisplay.summary:
Enables or disables a virtual display for the specified client. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

enable.summary: Whether to enable (`true`) or disable (`false`) a virtual display

generateKey.summary:
Triggers the key events (key press and release). 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

keys.summary: A list of keys to simulate

delay.summary: The amount of time to wait (in seconds) before sending the key event

client.summary: The client name can be used instead of callsign

getAvailableTypes.summary:
Returns the list of application types available on the firmware. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

getBounds.summary:
Gets the bounds of the specified client. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

getClients.summary:
Gets a list of clients. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

getCursorSize.summary:
Returns the currently set cursor size. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

getHolePunch.summary:
Returns whether video hole punching is enabled or disabled for the specified client. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

getKeyRepeatsEnabled.summary:
Returns whether key repeating is enabled or disabled. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

getLastWakeupKey.summary:
Returns the last key press prior to a device wakeup. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

timestampInSeconds.summary: The time, in seconds, of the last wakeup

getLogLevel.summary:
Returns the currently set logging level. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

getLogsFlushingEnabled.summary:
Returns whether log flushing is enabled or disabled. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

getOpacity.summary:
Gets the opacity of the specified client. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

getScale.summary:
Returns the scale of an application. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

getScreenResolution.summary:
Gets the screen resolution. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

getScreenshot.summary:
Captures a screenshot. 
 
### Events 
| Event | Description | 
| :----------- | :----------- |
| `onScreenshotComplete` | Triggers when a screenshot is captured successfully |

getState.summary:
Returns the state of all applications.
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

runtimes.summary: A list of apps and their current state

state.summary: The runtime state of the app

getSystemMemory.summary:
Gets the information of System Memory. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

getSystemResourceInfo.summary:
Returns system resource information about each application. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

types.summary: A list of apps and their system resource information

ram.summary: The amount of memory the runtime is consuming in kb

vram.summary: The amount of graphics memory the runtime is consuming in kb (if supported)

getVirtualDisplayEnabled.summary:
Returns whether virtual display is enabled or disabled for the specified client. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

enabled.summary: `true` if a virtual display is enabled, otherwise `false`

getVirtualResolution.summary:
Returns the virtual display resolution for the specified client.
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

getVisibility.summary:
Gets the visibility of the specified client. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

visible.summary: Whether the client is visible (`true`) or not (`false`)

getZOrder.summary:
Returns an array of clients in Z order, starting with the top most application client first. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

hideAllClients.summary:
Hides/Unhides all the clients. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

hide.summary: true to hide all the clients, and false to unhide all the clients

hideCursor.summary:
Hides the cursor from showing on the display. The cursor is hidden by default. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

hideFullScreenImage.summary:
Hides the Full Screen Image. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

hideSplashLogo.summary:
Removes the splash screen. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

injectKey.summary:
Injects the keys. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

kill.summary:
Kills the specified client. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

launch.summary:
Launches an application. 
 
### Events 
| Event | Description | 
| :----------- | :----------- |
| `onLaunched` | Triggers when the runtime of an application is launched successfully |

type.summary: The ID of the runtime package or the callsign of the plugin desired to be cloned

version.summary: The version of the package. Defaults to the latest version

suspend.summary: Whether to suspend the app on launch (`true`) or not (`false`). Default is `false`

visible.summary: Whether the app is visible on launch (`true`) or not (`false`). Default is `true`. The value will be `false` if the `suspend` argument is `true`

focused.summary: Whether the app is focused on launch (`true`) or not (`false`). Default is `true`. The app cannot be focused if the `visible` argument is set to `false`

configuration.summary: The plugin configuration overrides. Empty by default

behind.summary: The client to put behind. Defaults to top of z-order

scaleToFit.summary: Whether the app can be scaled to fit the current bounds. Default is `false`.

holePunch.summary: Whether the video hole punching can be enabled for the client. Default is `true`.

topmost.summary: Whether the app appears above all other apps on the display. Default is `false`.

focus.summary: Whether the app should be under focus. Default is `false`.

autodestroy.summary: Whether the application can be automatically destroyed. Default is `true`.

launchApplication.summary:
Launches an application. 
 
### Events 
| Event | Description | 
| :----------- | :----------- |
| `onApplicationLaunched` | Triggers when an application is launched successfully |.

topmost.summary: true to put the application at the top, otherwise false

focus.summary: true to put the application above all other applications, otherwise false

launchResidentApp.summary:
Launches the Resident application. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

moveBehind.summary:
Moves the specified client behind the specified target client. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

target.summary: The target in which the client moves behind

moveToBack.summary:
Moves the specified client to the back or bottom of the Z order. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

moveToFront.summary:
Moves the specified client to the front or top of the Z order. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

removeAllKeyIntercepts.summary:
Removes all key intercepts. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

removeAllKeyListeners.summary:
Removes all key listeners. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

removeAnimation.summary:
Removes the current animation for the specified client. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

removeKeyIntercept.summary:
Removes a key intercept. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

removeKeyListener.summary:
Removes a key listener for an application. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

keys.summary: A list of keys for which to remove a listener for the specified application (only symbol * (string data type) is acceptable)

removeKeyMetadataListener.summary:
Removes the key metadata listeners. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

resetInactivityTime.summary:
Resets the inactivity notification interval. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

resumeApplication.summary:
Resumes an application. 
 
### Events 
| Event | Description | 
| :----------- | :----------- |
| `onApplicationResumed` | Triggers when an application resumes from a suspended state |.

scaleToFit.summary:
Scales the specified client to fit the current bounds. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

setBounds.summary:
Sets the bounds of the specified client. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

setCursorSize.summary:
Sets the cursor size. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

setFocus.summary:
Sets focus to the specified client. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

setHolePunch.summary:
Enables or disables video hole punching for the specified client. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

setInactivityInterval.summary:
Sets the inactivity notification interval. 
 
### Events 
| Event | Description | 
| :----------- | :----------- |
| `onUserInactivity` | Triggers only if the device is inactive for the specified time interval |.

interval.summary: The inactivity event interval in minutes

setLogLevel.summary:
Sets the logging level. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

setMemoryMonitor.summary:
Enables or disables RAM memory monitoring on the device. Upon enabling, triggers possible events are onDeviceLowRamWarning, onDeviceCriticallyLowRamWarning, onDeviceLowRamWarningCleared, and onDeviceCriticallyLowRamWarningCleared. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

enable.summary: `true` to enable memory monitoring or `false` to disable memory monitoring

interval.summary: The duration, in seconds, between memory checks

lowRam.summary: The threshold, in Megabytes, after which a `onDeviceLowRamWarning` event is generated

criticallyLowRam.summary: The threshold, in Megabytes, after which a critically `onDeviceCriticallyLowRamWarning` event is generated

setOpacity.summary:
Sets the opacity of the specified client. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

setScale.summary:
Scales an application. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

setScreenResolution.summary:
Sets the screen resolution. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

setTopmost.summary:
Sets whether the specified client appears above all other clients on the display. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

topmost.summary: `true` to set the client as the top most client.

focus.summary: `true' to set focus for the client

setVirtualResolution.summary:
Sets the virtual resolution for the specified client. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

width.summary: The width of the virtual resolution

height.summary: The height of the virtual resolution

setVisibility.summary:
Sets whether the specified client should be visible. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

showCursor.summary:
Shows the cursor on the display using the current cursor size. See `setCursorSize`. The cursor automatically disappears after 5 seconds of inactivity. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

showFullScreenImage.summary:
Shows the Full Screen Image. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

showSplashLogo.summary:
Displays the splash screen. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

displayTime.summary: The amount of the time to show the splash screen

showWatermark.summary:
Sets whether a watermark shows on the display. 
 
### Events
 
 No Events.

show.summary: `true` to show the watermark or `false` to hide the watermark

suspend.summary:
Suspends an application. 
 
### Events 
| Event | Description | 
| :----------- | :----------- |
| `onSuspended` | Triggers when the runtime of an application is suspended |

suspendApplication.summary:
Suspends an application. 
 
### Events 
| Event | Description | 
| :----------- | :----------- |
| `onApplicationSuspended` | Triggers when an application is suspended |.

onApplicationActivated.summary: Triggered when an application is activated

onApplicationConnected.summary: Triggered when a connection to an application succeeds

onApplicationDisconnected.summary: Triggered when an attempt to disconnect from an application succeeds

onApplicationFirstFrame.summary: Triggered when the first frame of an application is loaded

onApplicationLaunched.summary: Triggered when an application launches successfully

onApplicationResumed.summary: Triggered when an application resumes from a suspended state

onApplicationSuspended.summary: Triggered when an application is suspended

onDestroyed.summary: Triggered when a runtime is destroyed

onDeviceCriticallyLowRamWarning.summary: Triggered when the RAM memory on the device exceeds the configured `criticallyLowRam` threshold value. See `setMemoryMonitor`.

onDeviceCriticallyLowRamWarningCleared.summary: Triggered when the RAM memory on the device no longer exceeds the configured `criticallyLowRam` threshold value. See `setMemoryMonitor`.

onDeviceLowRamWarning.summary: Triggered when the RAM memory on the device exceeds the configured `lowRam` threshold value. See `setMemoryMonitor`.

onDeviceLowRamWarningCleared.summary: Triggered when the RAM memory on the device no longer exceeds the configured `lowRam` threshold value. See `setMemoryMonitor`.

onLaunched.summary: Triggered when a runtime is launched

launchType.summary: The launch type of an application

onSuspended.summary: Triggered when a runtime is suspended

onUserInactivity.summary: Triggered when a device has been inactive for a period of time. This event is broadcasted at the frequency specified by `setInactivityInterval` if the device is not active. The default frequency is 15 minutes.

minutes.summary: The number of minutes that the device has been inactive

onWillDestroy.summary: Triggered when an application is set to be destroyed

onPluginSuspended.summary: Triggered when a plugin is suspended

onScreenshotComplete.summary: Triggered when a screenshot is captured successfully using `getScreenshot` method

onBlur.summary: Triggered when the focused client is blurred.

onFocus.summary: Triggered when a client is set to focus.
